item.title: Norway Proves Paid Leave Won’t Make Families Bigger Or Happier
item.description: 'Universal' paid leave sounds good, but in practice, it forces everyone onto the same track: working early, institutional childcare early.

item.title: Trump jokes his admin will 'forget about' separation of church and state: 'We're bringing religion back'
item.description: President Donald Trump celebrated the National Day of Prayer on Thursday by joking that his administration may end the separation of church and state.

item.title: HHS Report Confirms No Evidence To Support Castrating And Mutilating Gender Confused Kids
item.description: HHS specifically determined that the 'gender-identity' method used to rationalize irreversibly damaging kids’ minds and bodies is senseless.

item.title: Mark Carney, Eh?
item.description: Will Canada suffer through even worse federal policy than it did with Justin Trudeau over the past ten years?

item.title: Fired For Exposing The Biden-Era Military’s Marxist Drift, Former Officer Pledges To Restore ‘Accountability’ To The Force
item.description: Testifying during his Thursday confirmation hearing, Matt Lohmeier pledged to ensure 'a culture of accountability' in the Air Force.

item.title: A Day at Boston’s Isabella Stewart Gardner Museum
item.description: Superbly restored rooms, a show on the art of vodou, and energy and élan at a New England treasure.

item.title: Study: Private School Choice Makes Even Public Schoolers More Likely To Earn College Degrees
item.description: The effect of Ohio’s scholarship program reinforces why states should continue to expand school choice for all families.

item.title: Biden’s Lawfare Nearly Ripped This South Dakota Ranching Family Apart
item.description: This family faced jail sentences so extreme 'they were told to find alternatives to raise their young children,' Ag Secretary Brooke Rollins said.
